I don’t ever need help at any time, I figure out things myself.[quote=“TeleNubby, post:9, topic:228500”][quote author=public void mscpidiots() link=topic=300448.msg2411647#msg2411647 date=1219957379]

[/quote]You ARE an idiot, so fuck off.[/quote]Says a mod that vists the site only once in more than 10 days just to tell me to fuck off. Why don’t you fuck off?

item.title: Help With NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

I tried this tut,

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


for adding NPC drops and
Anyways I tried it and I got no errors, but when I go to attack the NPC, when im attacking it, everytime I hit it it drops!
Rofl, I dont understand this at all.

Heres my Item.java code,

public static int Thief[] = {995,15335}; 
    public static int randomThief()
    {
        return Thief[(int)(Math.random()*Thief.length)];
    }</blockquote>

And heres my NPCHandler.java code,

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 283) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomThief(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

Read full topic
